channel.title: [317] Serenity-PK (Combattscape Base) Release [317]
channel.description:
Well I got bored and took a look at the combattscape base release. He had so many fucking spelling error's I lol'd in real life. Well I didn't really get to finish but I did get rid of this.
-His failed anti duping system -His Failed dropping system -his gay custom's like gray phat or wtf it is. - Fixed D claw animation and regular hitting -Fixed up statius gfx animation etc -Same for vesta longsword -Cleaned up some of his commands. -I changed the location of some skilling area's to "home" so you wouldn't have to do ::magewc etc... - I didn't change his shop names so blah -I am not doing any pictures as most of the picture's are in his thread. -I got rid of his donater rank for items such as vesta etc... -I did not change the cilent 1 bit because I knew I wouldn't keep this source. Instead I'm trying edit Devolution 2.5
-Heres the Cilent Link http://www.filefront.com/14046611/client%20by%20bounty.rar
- Here's the Server link http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=d9234f4e6a31066ed8f14848abf485dde04e75f6e8ebb871
-I know the cilent.java is extremely messy, if you have a problem tell the owner of Combattscape and scream at him for having a unclean server source.
- The home area is quite beautiful O: if i say so myself. I also put shops at home. -Credits go to Delta Combattscape Owner Me I am not doing percent's because I personally don't remember how much I've done and how much he's done. But if it were MY OPINION this is how it would look like. -Delta 30% -Combattscape Owner 45% -Me 25%? Maybe too much.
